description:
Cohen Garelick & Glazier is a full-service law firm in Indianapolis, Indiana, that businesses and individuals can turn to for a wide range of legal needs. Our attorneys have deep knowledge and years of experience in their areas of practice, providing customized assistance that clients can rely on.

Services our law firm provides include the following:

  • Arbitration, mediation, litigation and appeals
  • Business law: business planning, business formation, contracts, franchising and licensing litigation, intellectual property, trademarks, copyrights, business litigation, shareholder and partnership disputes
  • Employment law: contracts and agreements, employee benefits, wage and hour claims, workers' compensation, employment terminations and wrongful discharge, sexual harassment, discrimination
  • Construction law: construction defect claims, construction accidents
  • Criminal defense: white collar crimes, alcohol-related crimes, drug crimes, sex crimes, assault and battery, hit-and-run
  • Tax planning and disputes
  • Professional negligence insurance litigation
  • Estate planning and probate: trusts, wills, probate and trust litigation, probate and estate administration, high net worth estate planning, business succession planning
  • Family law: divorce, child custody and visitation, adoption, child support mediation and collaborative law, spousal support
  • Personal injury: truck accidents, product liability, motor vehicle accidents, premises liability, wrongful death, medical malpractice, motorcycle accidents
  • Real estate: litigation, lease disputes, foreclosure, HOA and COA disputes, financing and acquisition, land purchase agreements
In addition to Indiana, we are able to serve clients in several other states. The law firm of Cohen Garelick & Glazier accepts credit cards for our clients' convenience.
